Advert Messages: <orange>Precisa de Ajuda?<end> Entre em contato com os <cyan>Admins<end> no chat.
Insultos e Xingamentos não serão tolerados!
Abuso de Bugs, Cheats e Hackers não são tolerados, resultando em BAN <red>permanente<end>.
ADVERTS: Quer saber os comandos disponiveis no servidor? Digite <orange>/help<end>.
Digite <orange>/map<end> para saber o mapa do servidor.
Message Of The Day: We are using <cyan>Notifier<end> <grey>v3.0<end>, type <orange>/notifier help<end> for all its available commands.

MESSAGES.ADMINS JOIN MESSAGE: <#ADFF64>{username}<end> entrou no servidor, país de origem <orange>{country}<end>.
MESSAGES.ADVERTS COMMAND DESC: <orange>/adverts<end> <grey>-<end> Allows <cyan>Admins<end> to change the Adverts interval in-game.
MESSAGES.ADVERTS DESC: <orange>/adverts<end> <grey>-<end> Allows <cyan>Admins<end> to change the adverts interval ( i.g: /adverts 5 )
MESSAGES.AIRDROP CALLED: <yellow>Airdrop<end> chegando, partiu que pode ser seu!
MESSAGES.CHECK CONSOLE: Check the console (press F1) for more info.
MESSAGES.JOIN MESSAGE: <lime>{username}<end> entrou no servidor, país de origem <orange>{country}<end>.
MESSAGES.MAP LINK: See where you are on the server map at: <lime>http://{ip}:{port}<end>
MESSAGES.MOTD DESC: <orange>/motd<end> <grey>-<end> Allows <cyan>Admins<end> to change the MOTD in-game.
MESSAGES.NO LANG: Error, <lime>{args}<end> language not supported or does not exist.
MESSAGES.NO RULES: Error, no rules found, contact the <cyan>Admins<end>.
MESSAGES.PLAYERS LIST DESC: <orange>/players<end> <grey>-<end> List of all players in the server.
MESSAGES.PLAYERS ONLINE DESC: <orange>/online<end> <grey>-<end> Shows the number of players and <cyan>Admins<end> online, plus a few server stats.
MESSAGES.PLUGINS LIST DESC: <orange>/plugins<end> <grey>-<end> List of plugins installed in the server.

MOTD: This server now has the new <yellow>Message Of The Day<end> feature provided by <cyan>Notifier<end>. Use <orange>/motd<end> to know server's daily news!

DE: Spiel fair und missbrauche keine Bugs oder Exploits.
DK: Spil fair og misbrug ikke bugs / exploits.
EN: Play fair and don't abuse of bugs/exploits.
ES: Evita el Spam en el chat.
Juega limpio y no abuses de bugs/exploits.
FR: Évitez le spam dans le chat.
Jouer juste et ne pas abuser des bugs / exploits.
HU: Játssz tisztességesen és nem élj vissza a hibákkal.
IT: Fair Play e non abusare di bug / exploit.
JP: チート行為は固く禁じております。
全てのプレイヤーに敬意を払って下さい。
チャットでスパム行為はしないで下さい。
バグの悪用行為や公平なプレイはしないで下さい
NL: Vals spelen is ten strengste verboden.
Speel eerlijk en maak geen misbruik van bugs / exploits.
PT: Nao abuses de bugs ou exploits.
RO: Jucați corect și nu abuzați de bug-uri/exploituri!
RU: Играйте честно и не используйте баги и лазейки.
TR: Adil oynayın ve böcek / açıkları kötüye yok.
UA: Грати чесно і не зловживати помилки / подвиги.
